comment.author: 61361160@N00
comment._content: Love the backdrop - it's like it's practising to be filled in by the oil-painting apprentice!

comment.author: 26665203@N08
comment._content: Yeah, I know what you mean.  The rusty tinge only augments the background.  If I had lived during the 1840s I would have had all my subjects fidget.  Makes a more interesting image.  Is he in a hurry? Perhaps he's a lawyer and needs to get back to court or something...
